name: Richard Kruspe
description: '''Richard Kruspe''' ({{IPA|de|ˈʁɪçaʁt ˈkʁʊspə}}; born '''Sven Kruspe'''; 24 June 1967) is a German musician. He is the lead guitarist and one of the founders of the {{Lang|de|[[Neue Deutsche Härte]]|italic=no}} band [[Rammstein]], as well as the frontman of the [[industrial metal]] band [[Emigrate (band)|Emigrate]]. He has released eight studio albums with Rammstein and four albums with Emigrate.
